'''Meatnado''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Meatnado can be bought from [[Sara]] at the [[Good Hunter]].

Depending on the quality, Meatnado restores stamina by '''15'''/'''20'''/'''25''' after any party member defeats an opponent every 3 seconds for 900 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
